metadata.title: CVE-2021-3842 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
nltk is vulnerable to Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-nltk - 3.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nltk package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7-1').
